mapper.select: select id, status, practice_type, practice_name, program_use, type_order, paragraph_use, type_comment from practices_practicetype order by type_order, id
mapper.insert: insert into practices_practicetype( created, modified, status, practice_type, practice_name, program_use, type_order, paragraph_use, type_comment ) values ( now(), now(), #{status}, #{practice_type}, #{practice_name}, #{program_use}, #{type_order}, #{paragraph_use}, #{type_comment} )
mapper.update: update practices_practicetype set modified = now(), status = #{status}, practice_type = #{practice_type}, practice_name = #{practice_name}, program_use = #{program_use}, type_order = #{type_order}, paragraph_use = #{paragraph_use}, type_comment = #{type_comment} where id = #{id}
